Welcome to pyaln's documentation!
=================================

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
	     
   alignment

Alignment
=========
The core of pyaln is the Alignment class, which provides access to convenient methods for reading, processing, and writing alignments.
